snippet.title: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era — New gameplay trailer!
snippet.description:
From Ubisoft and Unfrozen Studio, a new legend is born. Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era is the official prequel hailing back to the origins of the genre-defining, critically acclaimed series of turn-based strategy games. As a new installment in the series, Olden Era returns to the world of Enroth and the origins of the legendary saga, inviting both veterans and new players to go on a new strategic quest on Jadame, a mysterious continent in turmoil, mentioned but never explored in the previous HoMM games, with its unique factions, biomes and creatures.

In this new trailer we are ramping up more and more reveals as we are getting closer to the Early Access date. Looking for a thrilling new adventure and a fast-paced battle to show your strength? HoMM: Olden Era will have it all! There will be multiple features from past Heroes games that were loved by the community and some very innovative new ones that will keep everything fresh!

You'll get your chance to try out the game very soon, keep a close eye on our announcements! Meanwhile, don't forget to follow us on our socials, and to wishlist the game on steam so you don't miss any uploads! 
https://discord.gg/pMCfXNCG
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3105440/Heroes_of_Might__Magic_Olden_Era/

Music credits: HoMM: Olden Era
